head.title: at-rule-name-case
head.description: at-rule-name-case Specify lowercase or uppercase for at-rules names. Note: only lowercase at-rule names are valid in SCSS. Options…

body:
#at-rule-name-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for at-rules names.

   @media (min-width: 10px) {}
/** ↑
 * These at-rule names */

Note: only lowercase at-rule names are valid in SCSS.

#Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

#"lower"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

@Charset 'UTF-8';
@cHarSeT 'UTF-8';
@CHARSET 'UTF-8';
@Media (min-width: 50em) {}
@mEdIa (min-width: 50em) {}
@MEDIA (min-width: 50em) {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

@charset 'UTF-8';
@media (min-width: 50em) {}

#"upper"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

@Charset 'UTF-8';
@cHarSeT 'UTF-8';
@charset 'UTF-8';
@Media (min-width: 50em) {}
@mEdIa (min-width: 50em) {}
@media (min-width: 50em) {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

@CHARSET 'UTF-8';
@MEDIA (min-width: 50em) {}
